body.content:
Dear Gerard

Thank you for your response indicating interest in my proposal.

Please, I would like to know more about you. Let's get to know more
about you to make the work of my Lawyers and bankers easier.

To proceed, kindly forward the following information to me;

1. Country of residence.
2. Nature of business you are currently into.
3 Scanned copies of your ID card, preferably International Passport.
4. Scanned copies of your recent utility bill.
5. Working Telephone lines I can reach you on in case we need to have
further discussions.

These will assist and guide my Lawyers in drafting any agreement.

Expecting your reply soon.

Kind regards,
Ruben.

On 5/24/21, gerard@asdfghjkl.ovh <gerard@asdfghjkl.ovh> wrote:
> Hello,
> how can I help you with this?
>
> Sincerely
> Gerard
>
>

header.subject: Re: How can i help with this?
